e989bb895ad11727016bbdb28c3fed7015fd7","dweb:/ipfs/QmS69Wxet8RHakmMCa1Gw7NwsFgVXGn1r3mfr3c6Q2wdtT"]},"src/asset-modules/interfaces/IRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0x86e2c365fbdd2e067fbda7e403ae60f81e0f2b97857405ffa8b28665ba84e224","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://034181704cc47903f1f7456c213c36e56412f91f39ed22cb5a8329cadec84e6c","dweb:/ipfs/QmZ3sX63UVugjKXDDG912gpxdhDMuyGZCfth7zBEXr4fGp"]},"src/interfaces/IAssetModule.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7e5fc785ce2fee01ccfd692670ac6144b7fe089c26bad218db3e4ad9925f5fbb","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://42d8d4f49849b822c5e7608f4f8aa25c5e156328ee6f1f9f2b33836555d1e50f","dweb:/ipfs/QmX4ypCaGgRCnK1y3DwkLeLY4Sq4z9HhGTFpycGkaFaLEX"]},"src/interfaces/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf04997e92f35601d4436f8699686af137bcec58436b0f2727d7b9c2f331a7eab","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a391569d01508815235b54a537b72d80b92bee4535fdfad6143a50958f34fb23","dweb:/ipfs/QmWz69D2hdQyTc4qGdoTAJYAi8uQYuNVXThqSFRuWL6Q1k"]},"src/libraries/AssetValuationLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3a422c02f50b1c8cd9a6f193b607dddb2acbb28b6a03a3774fc7a76b753346c8","license":"BUSL-1.1","urls":["bzz-raw://5901738c5fe4963e253ec59b181ff16bda4e44305eeebf1aeace83f5fd820358","dweb:/ipfs/QmNy5Ep7qAgKL1gXVWra1xHUWQWeb9VKJjmCnFhaLdLfrA"]}},"version":1}

addAsset(address,bytes32).details: Assets can't have more than 18 decimals.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.oracleSequence: The sequence of the oracles to price the asset in USD, packed in a single bytes32 object.

constructor.details: The ASSET_TYPE, necessary for the deposit and withdraw logic in the Accounts, is "1" for ERC20 tokens.

params.registry_: The contract address of the Registry.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.

returns.collateralFactor: The collateral factor of the asset for the Creditor, 4 decimals precision.
returns.liquidationFactor: The liquidation factor of the asset for the Creditor, 4 decimals precision.

getValue(address,address,uint256,uint256.details: If the asset is not added to AssetModule, this function will return value 0 without throwing an error. However check in here is not necessary, since the check if the asset is added to the AssetModule is already done in the Registry.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.

returns.collateralFactor: The collateral factor of the asset for a given Creditor, with 4 decimals precision.
returns.liquidationFactor: The liquidation factor of the asset for a given Creditor, with 4 decimals precision.
returns.valueInUsd: The value of the asset denominated in USD, with 18 decimals precision.

isAllowed(address,uint256).details: Since ERC20s don't have an id, the id should be set to 0.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset. param assetId The id of the asset.

returns._0: A boolean, indicating if the asset is allowed.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.

returns._0: recursiveCalls The number of calls done to different asset modules to process the deposit/withdrawal of the asset.

processDirectWithdrawal(address,address,.details: The checks on exposures are only done to block deposits that would over-expose a Creditor to a certain asset or protocol. Underflows will not revert, but the exposure is instead set to 0.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.

processIndirectDeposit(address,address,u.details: An indirect deposit is initiated by a deposit of a Derived Asset (the upper asset), from which the asset of this Asset Module is an Underlying Asset.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.
params.deltaExposureUpperAssetToAsset: The increase or decrease in exposure of the upper asset to the asset of this Asset Module since last interaction.
params.exposureUpperAssetToAsset: The amount of exposure of the upper asset to the asset of this Asset Module.

returns.recursiveCalls: The number of calls done to different asset modules to process the deposit/withdrawal of the asset.
returns.usdExposureUpperAssetToAsset: The USD value of the exposure of the upper asset to the asset of this Asset Module, 18 decimals precision.

processIndirectWithdrawal(address,addres.details: An indirect withdrawal is initiated by a withdrawal of a Derived Asset (the upper asset), from which the asset of this Asset Module is an Underlying Asset.The checks on exposures are only done to block deposits that would over-expose a Creditor to a certain asset or protocol. Underflows will not revert, but the exposure is instead set to 0.Due to changing compositions of derived assets, exposure to a primary asset can increase or decrease over time, independent of deposits/withdrawals. When derived assets are deposited/withdrawn, these changes in composition since last interaction are also synced. As such the actual exposure on an indirect withdrawal of a primary asset can exceed the maxExposure, but this should never be blocked, (the withdrawal actually improves the situation by making the asset less over-exposed).

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.
params.deltaExposureUpperAssetToAsset: The increase or decrease in exposure of the upper asset to the asset of this Asset Module since last interaction.
params.exposureUpperAssetToAsset: The amount of exposure of the upper asset to the asset of this Asset Module.

returns.usdExposureUpperAssetToAsset: The USD value of the exposure of the upper asset to the asset of this Asset Module, 18 decimals precision.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.newOracles: The new sequence of the oracles, to price the asset in USD, packed in a single bytes32 object.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.collateralFactor: The collateral factor of the asset for the Creditor, 4 decimals precision.
params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.
params.liquidationFactor: The liquidation factor of the asset for the Creditor, 4 decimals precision.
params.maxExposure: The maximum exposure of a Creditor to the asset.

addAsset(address,bytes32).notice: Adds a new asset to the ERC20PrimaryAM.

getRiskFactors(address,address,uint256).notice: Returns the risk factors of an asset for a Creditor.

getValue(address,address,uint256,uint256.notice: Returns the USD value of an asset.

isAllowed(address,uint256).notice: Checks for a token address and the corresponding id if it is allowed.

processDirectDeposit(address,address,uin.notice: Increases the exposure to an asset on a direct deposit.

processDirectWithdrawal(address,address,.notice: Decreases the exposure to an asset on a direct withdrawal.

processIndirectDeposit(address,address,u.notice: Increases the exposure to an asset on an indirect deposit.

processIndirectWithdrawal(address,addres.notice: Decreases the exposure to an asset on an indirect withdrawal.

setOracles(address,uint256,bytes32).notice: Sets a new oracle sequence in the case one of the current oracles is not active.

setRiskParameters(address,address,uint25.notice: Sets the risk parameters for an asset for a given Creditor.
